00020 #ifndef H_RDATA_RGRAPHICS_RCOLOR
00021 #define H_RDATA_RGRAPHICS_RCOLOR
00022 
00023 #include <stdint.h>
00024 typedef uint32_t RColorRGB;
00025 
00026 const RColorRGB RGB_BLACK   = 0x00000000;
00027 const RColorRGB RGB_WHITE   = 0x00ffffff;
00028 const RColorRGB RGB_RED     = 0x00ff0000;
00029 const RColorRGB RGB_GREEN   = 0x0000ff00;
00030 const RColorRGB RGB_BLUE    = 0x000000ff;
00031 const RColorRGB RGB_YELLOW  = 0x00ffff00;
00032 const RColorRGB RGB_MAGENTA = 0x00ff00ff;
00033 const RColorRGB RGB_CYAN    = 0x0000ffff;
00034 const RColorRGB RGB_GRAY    = 0x00888888;
00035 const RColorRGB RGB_ORANGE  = 0x00ff8800;
00036 
00037 inline unsigned char rgbGetRed(RColorRGB c)   { return (unsigned char) ((c & 0xff0000) >> 16); }
00038 inline unsigned char rgbGetGreen(RColorRGB c) { return (unsigned char) ((c & 0x00ff00) >> 8); }
00039 inline unsigned char rgbGetBlue(RColorRGB c)  { return (unsigned char) ((c & 0x0000ff)); }
00040 
00041 enum C8Color {
00042     C8Black, 
00043     C8Blue, 
00044     C8Green, 
00045     C8Cyan, 
00046     C8Red, 
00047     C8Magenta, 
00048     C8Yellow, 
00049     C8White, 
00050     C8Gray
00051 };
00052 
00053 #endif
